TITLE GOES HERE: Use the `HELPrct` data from the `r pkg_macro(mosaicData)` to calculate the mean of all numeric variables (be sure to exclude missing values).

 <!--begin-answer-->

```{r }
library(mdsr)
library(mosaicData)
HELPrct %>%
  summarize(across(where(is.numeric), mean, na.rm = TRUE))
```
 <!--end-answer-->
